altitude_insulation_helper: If the sun altitude falls below this level, blinds insulation will be activated
altitude_shade_helper: If the sun altitude rises above this level, blinds shading will be activated
azimuth_helper: If the sun azimuth (between 0 and 360Â°) is between left and right value, blinds shading will be activated
description: Manage blinds for optimal insulation and shading
insulation_active_helper: Activate insulation when outside temperature falls below a certain level
shade_active_helper: Use blinds for shading when outside-, inside-temperature and sun intensity rise above a certain level
sun_uv_helper: If UV index rises above this level shading will be activated
temperature_inside_shade_helper: If inside temperature rises above this level shading will be activated
temperature_outside_insulation_helper: If outside temperature falls below this level shading will be activated
temperature_outside_shade_helper: If outside temperature rises above this level shading will be activated
title: Blinds control
